title: Restore Radar tab between Driver and Beach tabs

requirements.text: Add Radar tab to the bottom navigation between Driver tab and Beach tab, using the existing BottomNav component structure

quotes: sürücü ile play deniz sekmesi arasındaydi

acceptanceCriteria: Radar tab appears in bottom navigation between Driver and Beach tabs
Tab label is internationalized in Turkish and English
Active state styling matches other tabs in BottomNav

requirements.text: Create RadarScreen component that uses the location from the main weather location state (the location entered in the Hava Durumu/Weather section) to display weather radar visualization

quotes: konumu zaten hava durumu kısmından giriyordum o kısımdaki konum bilgisini kullanıyordu

acceptanceCriteria: RadarScreen component receives location from App.tsx location state
Component only renders when a location is selected
Shows appropriate empty state when no location is available

requirements.text: Integrate existing RadarMap component into RadarScreen to display cloud and precipitation layers on the map using the weather API data

quotes: harita üüzerinde bulut ve yağış durumunu gösteriyorduü
Harita üzerinde bulut ve yağış durumu görselleştirilecek

acceptanceCriteria: RadarMap component renders with cloud and precipitation overlays
Map centers on the selected location coordinates
Weather data from API is fetched and displayed on map layers
Map shows current cloud cover and precipitation intensity

requirements.text: Wire up the Radar tab in App.tsx to conditionally render RadarScreen when the radar tab is active, following the same pattern as other tabs (weather, farmer, driver, beach)
acceptanceCriteria: Tab switching works smoothly between all tabs including radar
Location prop is passed from App.tsx to RadarScreen

requirements.text: Add internationalization strings for the Radar tab label in both Turkish ('Radar') and English ('Radar') to the translations dictionary
acceptanceCriteria: Tab label updates when language is changed

constraints: Do not modify the backend - all weather data comes from client-side API calls
Use existing RadarMap component and radar-related hooks (useRainViewer, useRadarOverlayData)
Follow the same component structure and patterns as other tab screens (WeatherPanel, FarmerGardenWeatherPanel, DriverWeatherPanel, BeachMarineScreen)
Do not implement real-time GPS or live location tracking - use the manually entered location from weather section
Maintain the existing BottomNav component structure with glass morphism design
nonGoals: Adding new weather data sources or APIs
Implementing GPS or automatic location detection
Creating new backend endpoints for radar data
Modifying existing radar components beyond integration
Adding radar-specific settings or configuration UI beyond what already exists
